= From OSM to OA =

 * [http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/API_v0.6 OSM API]
 * Export all nodes
{{{
curl --globoff --location http://www.informationfreeway.org/api/0.6/node[addr:housenumber] -o addresses.osm
}}}
 * Export everything
{{{
curl --globoff --location http://www.informationfreeway.org/api/0.6/*[addr:housenumber] -o addressesAll.osm
}}}

== Parsing data ==

 * Convert to flat file
{{{
   xml2 < addressesAll.osm > addressesFlat.txt
}}}
 * Export all node to address point
 * Export all way to address point
{{{
foreach way
   get all coordinates and compute centroid
      store address point by using addr key
}}}
